Blood sample take point 0 , 2 , 3 6 hour administration . At time point , blood pressure endothelial function ( non-invasive method ) measure .
DOC.criteria: 1.Healthy male age 20 39 meet exclusion criterion . 1 . Body mass index ( BMI ) low 18 great 27 Kg/m2 2 . Smokers 3 . Regular medication 4 . Consumption medication last week 5 . Following weightloss diet 6 . Vegetarians 7 . Abnormal glucose level 8 . Diabetes 9 . Cardiovascular disease 10 . Gastrointestinal disease 11 . Anemia 12 . Allergy
